amendment.description: To reallocate the distribution of funds from the Emergency Fund for Indian Safety and Health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 5084 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 5076. (consideration: CR S6811-6813, S6815; text: CR S6811) To reallocate the distribution of funds from the Emergency Fund for Indian Safety and Health.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5084 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 5076.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
